column4: I am having problems routing in ubuntu 8.04, i done the following echo "1" > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/ip_forward also edited /etc/sysctl.conf and added net.ipv4.ip_forward=1 then did /etc/init.d/networking restart and /etc/init.d/procps restart yet it still does not route trafic? any ideas
you ran the first command as root, right?
because it can be kind of tricky to use with sudo..
I'm not sure if you need to setup some iptables rules just for general routing.. are you following some kind of howto?
